dcterms:description: A dataset used for segmenting a linearly ordered stream of pages into documents, specifically in the title insurance domain.
dcterms:title: Page Stream Segmentation Dataset

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset used for evaluating segmentation methods, though no formal citation is provided.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset
